title: To Catch A Cheater: She Wants Proof That Her Sister's Fiancé Isn't The Man He Says He Is
description:
You think your significant other is cheating, but you’re not certain. We’ll put them to the test! We’re ready to set the trap and go on SnapChat (well, we’d send Kristin’s friend on SnapChat) to try to lure him into doing something inappropriate so we could expose him as the dirty cheater he is (or, to be fair, expose him as the great guy and boyfriend that he is).
She absolutely HATES the man her sister is about to marry in a few weeks. She is certain that he is unfaithful and wants proof to help stop her sister from making a big mistake. 
Can we help her? We'll try! 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Pionaire Podcasting
